description.en:
1-3: Itoshi Koishi Kimi Dake ni
"As long as I can be by his side, even if it is only as a friend...?"
Yamato, who only ever thought about his studies, fell in love at first sight with the bright and handsome Yuuki. Yamato had already decided on the "okay with being just friends" mindset for the rest of his uni life. So, whatever feelings he had towards Yuuki, he would quietly deal with on his own. However, one day...

4: Deep Night Love
A perfect love might be what everyone wants, but for Masaki, having one has its discomforts. His hot lover, Akisada, has looks, financial stability, a super darling attitude and skill in bed. How should Masaki, an ordinary person with an ordinary life, control his low self-esteem?

5: Shitsukeraretai Hodo Suki (Disciplinary Love)
Being the only straight man among his cheerful gay friends initially made Takuma skeptical about a same-sex relationship. But when Shiba, his new co-worker who has an obedient and honest attitude, confesses his feelings every day to his face, will Takuma's heart finally move?
